CustomField.description: Checked if any Fix Out offers are checked
CustomField.formula: OR ( Waterproofing__c = TRUE, Tiles__c = TRUE, Fixing_hardware__c = TRUE, Wardrobe_fit_out__c = TRUE, Engineered_hard_flooring__c = TRUE, Solid_timber_flooring__c = TRUE, Internal_doors__c = TRUE, Internal_door_furniture__c = TRUE, Skirting_architraves__c = TRUE, Internal_stairs__c = TRUE, Fix_Out_Joinery__c = TRUE, Sink_basins_toilet_suites__c = TRUE, Stone_bench_tops__c = TRUE )
CustomField.label: Fix Out
